animeTitle: Utawarerumono: Tusukuru-koujo no Karei Naru Hibi
animeDescription: Included with the premium collection release of the PS4 remake of Utawarerumono: Chiriyukumono e no Komoriuta. The anime will tell the story of Kuon's childhood days. (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Taneda, Risa', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Kirii, Daisuke', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Watanabe, Akeno', 'Watanabe, Akeno']
